name: Playground Counselor
description:
Overview

Playground Counselor is a game where you play as the brilliant Dr. Pako as he helps his kindergarten patient. The only problem is, Dr. Pako is a kindergartener himself! Can you help him save his friend from their inner troubles?

Made by team Total Skunq at San Diego Game Jam 2018.

Recommended Ratio

1280 x 720px
